name: Pilot! Pilot!
description:
Welcome to a highly addictive and amazing game in which you can play as a Pilot of a fighter plane or a battle tank.

Plane mode:

Destroy your enemies with machine gun or fire a heat seeker missile at them.

Tank mode:

Survive as many waves of enemy tanks as you can and destroy the hell out of enemies.
(The game doesn't have sound yet but it will be there soon)

Artwork from: https://www.kenney.nl
